cause.description:
From the craptacular "Armageddon" to the depressingly mediocre "Transformers" remake, this camera-shaking hack has pinched out one cinematic turd too many!
Why does Michael Bay get to keep on making movies? Because nobody ever does anything to stop him!
1. A film entitled "Transformers" should focus on the Transformers.
2. A fim entitled "Pearl Harbour" should be about Pearl Harbour and not some stupid love triangle.
3. STOP SHAKING THE CAMERA ALREADY! I CAN'T SEE WHAT'S GOING ON!
cause.mission: Stop Michael Bay from making movies.
cause.name: Stop Michael Bay from making movies.
